name: Pal-O'Mine-zation!
text:
[Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.] 

During your turn, you may reveal 1 Normal Monster in your hand. This turn, that Monster can substitute for any 1 Fusion Material. If you do, the other Fusion Material(s) must be the correct one(s). 
This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
